definitions.definition: A person who uses a puppet .
Someone who is manipulative and thus able to get people to do what they want or to make events develop in the way they want in a puppet-like manner .

main_definition: A person who uses a puppet .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Someone who is manipulative and thus able to get people to do what they want or to make events develop in the way they want in a puppet-like manner .
